content: self-striping socks a purl on fire knitting pattern introduction these simple socks celebrate fabulous yarn if you ve churned out a few pairs of socks already these are sure to feel familiar my goal in this pattern is to share the combination of standard sock knitting elements that have become my preferred method for making socks with self-striping or self-patterning yarn they are worked cuff to toe have a heel flap reinforced with slip stitches and offer just enough stretch to fit a variety of feet feel free to take inspiration from this pattern and incorporate your favorite
